text:
TIRUNELVELI

Department of Economics – MSU: Seminar on ‘Feckless waterbodies management: Impacts and implications’, panel discussion, 10.30 a.m. valediction, L. Venkatachalam, Madras Institute of Development Studies, delivers address, MSU premises, 4 p.m.

Young Entrepreneur School: Chapter inauguration, Gunasingh Chelladurai, Director, Bell Pins, chief guest, Hotel RR Inn, Tirunelveli Junction, 5.30 p.m.

Vaan Muhil and Citizens’ Movement for Human Rights: Felicitation to Henry Tiphagne, Ayodhya Hall, Hotel Janagiram, Tirunelveli Junction, 5 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Regular meeting, V.K. Nursery and Primary School, Tirunelveli Town, 7 p.m.

ALWARKURICHI

Sri Paramakalyani Centre of Excellence in Environmental Sciences: World Water Day, K.G. Sivaramakrishnan, formerly emeritus processor, Madras Christian College, speaks, SPKCEES premises, 11 a.m.

CHERANMAHADEVI

SCAD College of Engineering and Technology: Entrepreneurship awareness programme, S. Balu, Assistant General Manager, Indian Bank, resource person, CSE seminar hall, 9 a.m. onwards.
title: engagements
